title: Photoluminescence of a TeCl4-grown MoTe2 Monolayer
description: Photoluminescence (PL) measurements on a single-gated MoTe2 monolayer device at 8K. The MoTe2 was grown using TeCl4 as a precursor. The presentation contains images of the device and PL spectra taken with a 1070 nm laser.
